title: Sources: Pixel 6 Pro was supposed to launch with face unlock
content:
9to5Google can report today that Google’s original plan was to launch the Pixel 6 Pro with face unlock, but the feature was pulled relatively close to launch.

more…

The post Sources: Pixel 6 Pro was supposed to launch with face unlock appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: 9to5Google can report today that the Pixel 6 Pro was originally planned to launch with face unlock, but it was pulled close to launch...
